mapper.select: select g.grip as grip, round(count(pg.grip_no)/(select count(*) from player_grip)*100) as gripDis from player_grip pg INNER JOIN grip g on pg.grip_no = g.grip_no group by pg.grip_no
select player_hand as hand, round(count(player_hand)/(select count(*) from player)*100) as handDis from player group by player_hand
